description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

1.1.2.description:
# Changelog
- Fixed some Achievement Challenges not being disabled when their respective Achievements are via YAML Option.
- Renamed Calculator to Dry's Calculator.
1.1.2.title: Version 1.1.2

1.2.0.description:
# Changelog
- **The Manual is now compatible with 0.6.2+ of Archipelago.**
- **Added Jumpscaresanity.**
- **Added content from the Revived Pain update.**
  - It was more or less just the 5 new Threats, though.
- Added the Character-Specific Items to the Logic of some Threats' Checks.
- **Improved Fishsanity by splitting it into 3 Options. See the YAML for details.**
1.2.0.title: Version 1.2.0

1.2.1.description:
# Changelog
- Added Myself and Scorched Myself to Jumpscaresanity.
- Removed Destroyman III from Jumpscaresanity.
- Updated Jumpscaresanity's number of Checks in the YAML to the correct number.
1.2.1.title: Version 1.2.1

1.2.2.description:
# Changelog
- Fixed a couple of typos involving the Starter Item `Barry's Hat` being changed to `Barry's Top Hat` in a recent update.
- Fixed Fishsanity not working due to a code error on my part.
1.2.2.title: Version 1.2.2

1.2.3.description:
- Renamed Xeskey to Glitch, since it was changed.
- Removed New Bunny Jumpscare Check since he doesn't jumpscare you.
1.2.3.title: Version 1.2.3

1.2.3a.description:
# Changelog
- This Manual is now compatible with 0.6.3+ of Archipelago.
1.2.3a.title: Version 1.2.3a

1.2.4.description:
# Changelog
- Fixed a New Bunny-related issue. (#10)
1.2.4.title: Version 1.2.4

1.2.5.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog
- Fixed some logical oversights that could occasionally occur due to not considering the Calm State of Mind, which grants the player 1 extra Max HP at the start.
- Fixed Pocket Bell not being considered a viable item for the I'm Prepared Achievement.
  - This means the Pocket Bell is now a Progression item, but ONLY for the Achievement. It would literally be Filler if not for that.
- Better described what Achievements are affected by the Hard Achievements Option.
- Updated the number of Checks added/removed from the Jumpscaresanity Option. Was slightly wrong due to the previous New Bunny mistake.
1.2.5.title: Version 1.2.5

1.2.6.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog
- Adjusted the logic of the Misfortune Achievement. Check the YAML for details.
- Hotfix: Fixed a typo causing generation to fail.
1.2.6.title: Version 1.2.6

1.2.7.description:
# Known Issues
None for now.
# Changelog
- Changed the design of the Traps so that setting `filler_traps` to 0 should now make no Traps appear.
1.2.7.title: Version 1.2.7

1.3.0.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog
- **Added a new Option that allows the Player to choose their Starting Difficulty.**
  - This also includes a brief explanation for each of them.
- Fixed the logic for `Gone Outside` due to it having a changed Requirement for achieving it.
- Changed the default Filler item from `Robux` to `Coins`.

Hotfix 1: **Fixed a typo that prevented generation for ever working.**
1.3.0.title: Version 1.3.0

1.3.1.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog
- Made an intentional error appear if #18 occurs within someone's YAML. Until this is permanently fixed, please do not have all Options disabled.
1.3.1.title: Version 1.3.1

1.3.2.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog
- Defaulted the Starting Difficulty Option to `Guilty` in the Template YAML.
- Defaulted Jumpscaresanity to `enabled` in the Template YAML. If you don't want to use it, be sure to disable it.
1.3.2.title: Version 1.3.2

1.4.0.description:
# Known Issues
- #18 still persists, but has been renamed to further specify the issue. Unsure how I could fix it for now.
# Changelog
- **Added Option: Achievement Challenges**.
  - With this and the other existing Options, the Player should now be able to disable all Challenge-related Checks if they don't wish to do them.
- Made it so the 4 Achievements related to fishing will be disabled if Fishsanity is also disabled.
- Added the Manual's files to GitHub for anyone who wishes to make PR's (Pull Requests) or overall assist with the Manual's development.
1.4.0.title: Version 1.4.0

2.0.0.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog (since last main release)
- Added Items and Checks relating to the `Heat` Threat.
  - I wasn't going to add this at first, but I caved for this update, so here ya go.
- Altered logic to account for `Calm` being used for `Unfortunate` and `That's my blood`.
- Removed `Faster than you` and `Taking a stroll`, as their associated items (Coffee and Bloxiade) were removed and their stats added to the Bloxy Cola.
  - Changed Sugary Drink and Coffee Cup to be Useful Items since new players won't have them, as their associated Achievements were removed in the Revived Pain update.
    - I didn't want to outright remove them from the Manual because people like me who had unlocked them before they were removed still have them, but for that same logic, I didn't want certain Checks to require them if a new player can't get them. This was the compromise I decided on.
- **Added all of Severed Connections' new content.**
- Removed FMNoob. A salute and moment of silence to an old friend.
- Removed some of the Sandbox Challenges since they aren't in this update.
- Renamed `Music Box` to `Handheld Music Box`.
- Added the `Handheld Music Box` as a condition for Puppet-related logic.
- Added an Option that allows you to remove all of the Flashlight Skins from the pool.
- Added a couple of miscellaneous Filler Items.
- Adjusted the wording of some YAML text in a few places.
- One new set of Checks added in this update was originally just an Option. However, it was merged to be a part of the main gameplay due to its logical simplicity.
  - This finally fixes https://github.com/WolfBoi008/One-More-Night/issues/18, now with no intentional failures necessary!
- Added an Option called Bell Logic, which allows the Player to decide if the Pocket Bell is considered for logic in some places or if it's ignored.
- Other things that I may have forgotten (or wrote in other pre-releases but didn't feel like needed to be mentioned here).

If there's anything I messed up logically or missed, feel free to let me know or [post an Issue](https://github.com/WolfBoi008/One-More-Night/issues)! Thank you for being patient while I worked on this for the last week!
2.0.0.title: Version 2.0.0

2.0.0-RC1.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog (since last pre-release)
- **Added all of the content from the second new Route.**
- Added the Lost State of Mind.
  - WARNING: Untested, as the State of Mind itself is in Early Access to be added into the game in the future. Let me know if anything changes with it!
Hotfix 1: Did some spacing and adjustment of YAML Option text.
2.0.0-RC1.title: Version 2.0.0 RC1

2.0.0-RC2.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog (since last pre-release)
- Fixed some logic relating to Jordi and Puppet.
2.0.0-RC2.title: Version 2.0.0 RC2

2.0.1r2.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog
- Removed FMNoob Fish. This should've already been removed along with the other FMNoob-related Checks, but I guess I'm a dumbass and forgot this one.
- Fixed numbers in the YAML related to Fishsanity because wow I was off.

Hotfix 1: Renamed Healthy to Iron Lungs because it's been changed since Revived Pain and I kept forgetting about it.
2.0.1r2.title: Version 2.0.1

2.1.0.description:
# Known Issues
- In Version 0.6.5 of Archipelago, some of the game's Options are too long to fully fit in the new YAML Creator when hovering over them. I may shorten said Options' descriptions in the future to account for this.
  - Until this is fixed, I recommend generating and opening the template YAML if you wish to be able to read the full descriptions.
# Changelog
- **Added Goals for beating some of the Endings with their respective States of Mind/Difficulties.**
2.1.0.title: Version 2.1.0

2.2.0.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog
- Removed Lost Difficulty.
  - It will be re-added once it is taken out of Early Access.
- Added Snowball as a temporary Starting Item.
  - It will be removed once the Christmas Season ends.
- **Added new Christmas Season + Nullscape Collab Content.**
  - Added 3 new Threats and their related Checks.
  - Added a new Starter Item.
  - Added 2 new Minor Unlocks.
  - Added 6 new Flashlight Skins.
  - Added a new Sandbox Preset Check and its associated Achievement.
  - Added an additional new Achievement.
- Removed Yellow Barry Jumpscare Check.
# Things to Still Add
- Most of the gift-exclusive Flashlight Skins.
# Things to Consider Changing
- Make certain late-game Achievements (False Savior and one of the new Achievements) consider beating their respective Challenges as part of logic.
  - Let me know if you think this would be a positive change or not!
2.2.0.title: Version 2.2.0

2.2.1.description:
# Known Issues
- #43: Memory Achievements fail to consider some unique cases. Help is wanted to make fixing their logic the opposite of a one-person, several-hour-long hassle.
# Changelog
- Added `Ventilation Errors 'Jumpscare'` Check for Jumpscaresanity.
- Added all of the Christmas Season Flashlight Skins that were missing from the previous version.
# Things to Add
- #36: Add community-made Presets to the Manual. If you know of any good ones, let me know. I'm currently looking for ones that, in an unbiased way, fit any of the following difficulties:
  - Easy
  - Normal
  - Hard
  - **Insane**
# Things to Consider Adding/Changing
- #24: Consider adding the One Nighter Mode to the Manual in some way.
- #38: Add new Filler Items. I'm open to community inside jokes, simple yet useless things, anything like that.
- #45: Rename Jumpscaresanity to Deathsanity. I'm unsure if I'll actually go through with this, as some characters can jumpscare without actually killing you (Mart, MikePike without his Penalty, etc.), possibly causing some Checks to need to be removed to avoid confusion. As such, let me know if you think this would be a positive change or not.
2.2.1.title: Version 2.2.1

pre-1.5.0.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog
- Added placeholder Items and Locations to prepare for the upcoming Severed Connections update later this month.
  - If any of these show up in your Multiworld, let me know, as they don't have any logic associated with them and are intended not to be seen until they're renamed and given logic when the update releases.
pre-1.5.0.title: Version pre-1.5.0

pre-2.0.0-1.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog (since last pre-release)
- Fixed up and added/removed some Placeholder Items and Checks.
- Added a Placeholder Option for an upcoming Severed Connections feature.
- Added Items and Checks relating to the Heat Threat.
  - <sub>I wasn't going to add this at first, but I caved for this update, so here ya go.</sub>
- Altered logic to account for Calm being used for `Unfortunate` and `That's my blood`.
- Removed `Faster than you` and `Taking a stroll`, as their associated items (Coffee and Bloxiade) were removed and their stats added to the Bloxy Cola.

pre-2.0.0-2.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog (since last pre-release)
- Changed Sugary Drink and Coffee Cup to be Useful Items since new players won't have them, as their associated Achievements were removed in the Revived Pain update.
  - <sub>I didn't want to outright remove them from the Manual because people like me who had unlocked them before they were removed still have them, but for that same logic, I didn't want certain Checks to require them if a new player can't get them. This was the compromise I decided on.</sub>

pre-2.0.0-3.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog (since last pre-release)
- **Added a big chunk of Severed Connections' new content.** Not everything is added yet, but it currently includes the following:
  - **New Threats**, excluding the ones related to the new Routes.
  - Some of the new fish that can be obtained in Fishsanity. <sub>A couple still need names and organization once I catch them myself.</sub>
  - Some of the new Minor Unlocks that I've obtained.
  - **New Option: Memorysanity.**
  - New Achievements.
  - One new Sandbox Challenge.
  - New Flashlight Skins. <sub>Filler as always, but funny to have.</sub>
- Removed FMNoob. A salute and moment of silence to an old friend.
- Removed some of the Sandbox Challenges since they aren't in this update.
- Other things that I may have forgotten.
pre-2.0.0-3.title: Version pre-2.0.0-3

pre-2.0.0-4.description:
# Warning
From this version onward, the Manual contains spoilers for the Severed Connections update. 
### If you care about spoilers, DO NOT PLAY THIS UPDATE!
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog
- Added the last three missing fish.
- Updated the numbers and data on Fishsanity's description.
- **Added the first new Route's related content.**
- Added some of the second new Route's related content, though some still needs to be filled in.
- Optimized the backend to hopefully prevent unintended generation failures further.
pre-2.0.0-4.title: Version pre-2.0.0-4

pre-2.0.0-5.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog
- Renamed `Music Box` to `Handheld Music Box`.
- Added the Handheld Music Box as a condition for Puppet-related logic.
- Added Checks related to the new Threats added in the first new Route. Forgot to with the last version, my bad.
- Updated the number of Checks affected by Jumpscaresanity in the YAML because I forgot to do that, too.
pre-2.0.0-5.title: Version pre-2.0.0-5

pre-2.0.0-6.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog (since last pre-release)
- Added `THEY HAVE TO DO SOMETHING` Achievement.
  - It requires little, logically, but is a Hard Achievement.
- Adjusted `Stardust Crusaders` Logic.
  - This also causes the `Tarot Cloth` Pre-Run Shop Item to be Progression now.
- Added `Glitched Card` Minor Unlock Item.
- Changed functions that handle intentional generation failures...again.
- Added a pre-release branch on the Repository to put the pre-release versions (and their code) from now on.
pre-2.0.0-6.title: Version pre-2.0.0-6

pre-2.0.0-7.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog (since last pre-release)
- **Changed the logic for Memorysanity Checks.**
  - As a result, the Threat Memory Items have been removed.
- Added an Option that allows you to remove all of the Flashlight Skins from the pool.
- Added a couple of miscellaneous Filler Items.
- Fixed the logic for `Everyone is Here`.
- Adjusted the wording of some YAML text in a few places.
- Changed the code preventing unintentional generation failures AGAIN again...
pre-2.0.0-7.title: Version pre-2.0.0-7

pre-2.0.0-8.description:
# Known Issues
None for now...
# Changelog (since last pre-release)
- **Merged the Memories Checks into the base Manual**, meaning they are not an Option anymore.
  - This should finally fix #18, now with no intentional failures necessary!
- Added an extra Check in Jumpscaresanity for a Threat found in the second new Route's final night.
- Added an Option called Bell Logic, which allows the Player to decide if the Pocket Bell is considered for logic in some places or if it's ignored.
pre-2.0.0-8.title: Version pre-2.0.0-8
